silverlib.geo

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • silverlib.geo.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Dot, Line, Rect

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object

    Abstract class to represent a 2D shape
